condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Across a) – c) utilizing joint UN approaches to rebuilding rule of law and justice sector institutions and services

Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Community-oriented security services and oversight mechanisms

Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Functional justice systems

Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Victim redress mechanisms including transitional justice
Country has strengthened capacities for governance and oversight of rule of law institutions
Country has strengthened institutions and systems supporting fulfilment of nationally and internationally ratified human rights obligations Human rights
Country has strengthened institutions and systems supporting fulfilment of nationally and internationally ratified human rights obligations Rule of law and justice
Country is using frameworks that leverage digital technologies and big data for: Delivery and monitoring of services
Country is using frameworks that leverage digital technologies and big data for: Public engagement
Number of Electoral Management Bodies (EMBs) with strengthened capacity to conduct inclusive, effective and accountable elections
Parliament has improved capacities to undertake inclusive, effective and accountable law-making
Women's participation in elections: Country has implemented Temporary Special Measures (TSMs) to ensure women’s participation and representation.
Women's participation in elections: Number of people on the governing mechanism of the electoral management body
Women's participation in elections: Proportion of women in governing mechanism
Women's participation in elections: Number of women in voter registry
Women's participation in elections: Number of women on the governing mechanism of the electoral management body
Women's participation in elections: Proportion of women in voter registry
Women's participation in elections: Number of people in voter registry
